thread.title: Trump Says He Is ’Totally Opposed to Domestic Violence’

author: Rebecca Ballhaus
title: Trump Says He Is ’Totally Opposed to Domestic Violence’
text:
WASHINGTON—President Donald Trump on Wednesday condemned domestic violence for the first time since his adviser Rob Porter resigned last week amid allegations he abused his ex-wives.
“I am totally opposed to domestic violence, and everyone here knows that,” Mr. Trump said, speaking in the Oval Office in a meeting with lawmakers and business leaders on tax reform. “I am totally opposed to domestic violence of any kind. Everybody knows that, and it almost wouldn’t even have to be said.”
